description:
Palmolive White Tea Antibacterial Liquid Hand Wash Soap is 95% natural origin and made with skin-loving ingredients and a naturally derived antibacterial agent, for healthy, beautiful hands. Contains 0% parabens, phthalates & alcohol.

Made with 100% natural white tea extract and a naturally derived antibacterial agent, Palmolive Antibacterial Liquid Hand Wash White Tea kills 99.9% of germs, andÂ is clinically proven to provide long lasting antibacterial protection.

Take a moment with this herbal blend of cedarwood, eucalyptus and patchouli balanced with bright tangy orange oil.

What we leave out is as important as what we put in
- No parabens.
- No phthalates.
- No mineral oil.
- No alcohol.
- No silicones.
- No soap.
- No gluten.
- No BPA.
- No animal derived ingredients.

Refill & save - enough for 4 x 250ml pumps.

Please recycle! This bottle is recyclable. Made with 65% less plastic, it's better for your wallet and better for the planet.

Use in the bathroom, kitchen and laundry.

ANTIBACTERIAL HAND WASH: Palmolive Antibacterial Liquid Hand Wash White Tea is 95% natural origin and kills 99.9% of germs with a naturally derived antibacterial agent and natural white tea extract

HERBAL SCENT: Take a moment with this herbal blend of cedarwood, eucalyptus and patchouli balanced with bright tangy orange oil.

FREE FROM: Parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, alcohol, silicones, soap, gluten, BPA, and animal derived ingredients

RECYCLABLE: Our Palmolive Liquid Hand Wash Soap bottle is made with 65 percent less plastic and is a recyclable bottle

REFILL AND SAVE: with our 1L Palmolive Liquid Hand Wash enough for 4 x 250mL pumps.
name: Palmolive Antibacterial Liquid Hand Wash Soap White Tea Refill 1L
